com.dimelo.dimelosdk.main

Class Chat.Customization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dimelo.dimelosdk.main.Chat.Customization
  • Enclosing class:
    Chat

    public static class Chat.Customization
extends java.lang.Object
     An inner class allowing chat customization.
 It can be used following three steps:
 1) call chat.getCustomization()
 2) modify any attribute
 3) call chat.apply() in order to register you changes and update the chat.
